suppress.notes: False positive. No temp directories created.
False positive. No SMTP log4j logging used.
False positive. No SMTP log4j logging used.
False positive. No remote log4j logging used.
Kotlin script is not used in the Sudo Platform User SDK. Set suppression to expire in 2 months.

vulnerability is in a Java API used for temporary file and folder creation. sudouser does not create temporary files or folders. This may be a false positive given the CVE documentation says it was fixed in kotlin V1.4.21 and we are using kotlin V1.4.30
